name: Shattered (itch) (MoMo)
description:
Our submission for GGJ 2021 is an experimental game in which we are inside a troubled girl's mind. We need to solve puzzles and collect different elements inside her mind in order to make things right again.

Credits: 

Hooman Jalalpoor (Unity Developer)
Golara Mozdbar (Game Designer)
Mahdi Motazedi (Artist, Animator)
Mohammad Reza Mohammadi (Narrative and Level Design)
Hesam Jalalpoor (Music and SFX)
Mohammad Khanpour Motazedi (Art Direction)

Repository Link: 

https://github.com/HoomanJCode/Shattered/
